attributes.title: Tall Tales for Short Folk
attributes.caption: Arriving at Verity's gorgeous hometown of Mimolette, the party is caught in awkward introductions and wild accusations.
attributes.description: Arriving at Verity's gorgeous hometown of Mimolette, the party is caught in awkward introductions and wild accusations.

attributes.title: A Gouda Samaritan
attributes.caption: The team offers some roadside assistance to a mermaid with a cheesy problem.
attributes.description: The team offers some roadside assistance to a mermaid with a cheesy problem.

attributes.title: Out of the Fry Pan
attributes.caption: An unsanctioned food battle takes place in the R’zzo kitchen and the party explores the festival grounds.
attributes.description: An unsanctioned food battle takes place in the R’zzo kitchen and the party explores the festival grounds.

attributes.title: A Long Rest At Last
attributes.caption: As the festival continues setting up our adventurers take a well earned rest and get to know the R'zzo family.
attributes.description: As the festival continues setting up our adventurers take a well earned rest and get to know the R'zzo family.

attributes.title: The Missing Menagerie
attributes.caption: A mysterious merchant has somehow acquired all of Hagan's belongings, and demands a favor of the party for their return.
attributes.description: A mysterious merchant has somehow acquired all of Hagan's belongings, and demands a favor of the party for their return.

attributes.title: And Now Your Home is Haunted
attributes.caption: Hagan is still missing as the party continues to fight their way out of the mimic house. Has Peter set them up for failure?
attributes.description: Hagan is still missing as the party continues to fight their way out of the mimic house. Has Peter set them up for failure?
attributes.display_title: And Now Your Home is Haunted

attributes.title: A Fungi in Need is a Friend Indeed
attributes.caption: The team finds Hagan safe and sound, but their new acquaintances are in some aquatic trouble.
attributes.description: The team finds Hagan safe and sound, but their new acquaintances are in some aquatic trouble.
attributes.display_title: A Fungi in Need is a Friend Indeed

attributes.title: Of Muscle and Thunder
attributes.caption: The party learns about Banbrek Thunderhorn, one of the Grand Company
attributes.description: The party learns about Banbrek Thunderhorn, one of the Grand Company

attributes.title: It's Just Nature
attributes.caption: The Forgotten Feast has begun! Competitors must forage for a special ingredient to be included in the first round’s cooking challenge.
attributes.description: The Forgotten Feast has begun! Competitors must forage for a special ingredient to be included in the first round’s cooking challenge.

attributes.title: No Laughing Matter
attributes.caption: Caught in a trap, the team throws caution into the wind to try and make it through round 1 of the Forgotten Feast in one piece!
attributes.description: Caught in a trap, the team throws caution into the wind to try and make it through round 1 of the Forgotten Feast in one piece!

attributes.title: Big Bird, Big Problem
attributes.caption: While the rest of the party was occupied with gnoll trouble makers, Verity finds some familiar folks in the sky. Now, how does she get down?
attributes.description: While the rest of the party was occupied with gnoll trouble makers, Verity finds some familiar folks in the sky. Now, how does she get down?

attributes.title: Keep an Eye Out for Spiders
attributes.caption: It's a bake off! Round one sees the competitors making many layers of cake. With no time to rest round two starts in a deep, dark cave.
attributes.description: It's a bake off! Round one sees the competitors making many layers of cake. With no time to rest round two starts in a deep, dark cave.
attributes.display_title: Keep an Eye Out for Spiders

attributes.title: Rising Problems
attributes.caption: Now they’re up in the air! Round two ends with a dish inspired by the local fungi while round three's challenges loom overhead the Forgotten Feast.
attributes.description: Now they’re up in the air! Round two ends with a dish inspired by the local fungi while round three's challenges loom overhead the Forgotten Feast.

attributes.title: Closing Ceremonies
attributes.caption: As teams source their last ingredients, the final cooking challenge of the Forgotten Feast commences! Who will win the competition and the coveted grand prize?
attributes.description: As teams source their last ingredients, the final cooking challenge of the Forgotten Feast commences! Who will win the competition and the coveted grand prize?

attributes.title: Who's Behind the Golden Mask?
attributes.caption: Hot off a heist our heroes seek to stash the stolen armor, but some new foes have other plans.
attributes.description: Hot off a heist our heroes seek to stash the stolen armor, but some new foes have other plans.

attributes.title: Do You Fear Justice?
attributes.caption: The party's fight with the Golden Mask continues. Justice arrives to try and make good on her namesake.
attributes.description: The party's fight with the Golden Mask continues. Justice arrives to try and make good on her namesake.

attributes.title: Gone, Not Forgotten
attributes.caption: The face behind the Golden Mask is revealed and Taylee is forever changed.
attributes.description: The face behind the Golden Mask is revealed and Taylee is forever changed.

attributes.title: In a Sea of Locked Memories
attributes.caption: Gellie works with Umbero to find out where the Golden Mask came from and what it's for, while the rest of the party deals with a prying Elizar.
attributes.description: Gellie works with Umbero to find out where the Golden Mask came from and what it's for, while the rest of the party deals with a prying Elizar.
attributes.display_title: In a Sea of Locked Memories

attributes.title: NEVER Split the Party
attributes.caption: Hagan and Taylee investigate the cause of an incoming stampede while Verity tries desperately to save the town from it. Gellie dives deeper into Umbero’s mind to try and find what magic is truly behind his lost memories.
attributes.description: Hagan and Taylee investigate the cause of an incoming stampede while Verity tries desperately to save the town from it. Gellie dives deeper into Umbero’s mind to try and find what magic is truly behind his lost memories.

attributes.title: Rising Tides from Hell
attributes.caption: Our weary heroes head back into town for a long rest, gain a new ally, and answer to combat erupting in the heart of Mimolette.
attributes.description: Our weary heroes head back into town for a long rest, gain a new ally, and answer to combat erupting in the heart of Mimolette.

attributes.title: Into the Unknown
attributes.caption: The party steps foot for the first time in Limbo, the realm of Tharzidun and the Agents of Chaos make their last attempt at stopping our heroes.
attributes.description: The party steps foot for the first time in Limbo, the realm of Tharzidun and the Agents of Chaos make their last attempt at stopping our heroes.

attributes.title: The Chained God
attributes.caption: Sivana reveals her true past and intentions as the party come face to face with the Chained God himself: Tharzidun.
attributes.description: Sivana reveals her true past and intentions as the party come face to face with the Chained God himself: Tharzidun.

attributes.title: Goodbye Party
attributes.caption: Tharzidun offers the party a tricky proposition that not only decides their fate, but the fate of all the Forgotten Realms.
attributes.description: Tharzidun offers the party a tricky proposition that not only decides their fate, but the fate of all the Forgotten Realms.
